name: Cards Weaver
description:
Locked in an interdimensional prison, your only hopes to escape are powerful cards, that can weave worlds back together. Use them to navigate this twisted dimension, fight mutated horrors and rescue fellow prisoners! Along the way, you will gain more powerful cards, and obtain mystical power ups. Will that be enough, to defeat this prison's overlord and finally break free?

 

Cards Weaver is a Deck-Building Rogue-Like game, where you battle foes with a deck composed by cards obtained during a single playthrough.

The twist is that YOU get to build the dungeon!

During exploration, or as a reward for battling enemies, you receive a special kind of cards called Map Cards, which when used will generate a new room for you to explore!
You can place this room adjacent to already existing rooms, and literally compose your own personal dungeon to explore.

On top of that, you will also find another kind of cards known as Resource Cards, which are used to interact with the world around you!
Depending on the element of said cards, various effects can be achieved, so be sure to try them all!
You can also use them in combat ;)

Production Infos

This game was made as a university project for a course in Game Development, at Verona (Italy).
It was inspired by games such as Slay of the Spire, Roguebook and The Binding of Isaac.

There are some bugs, however we're willing to resolve them. If you find any bugs, fell free to report them in the comments below.

Some of us wants to continue developing the game.
Who knows what the future holds? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

This game was developed using Unreal Engine.
